channel.title: New Update - Dwarf Workshop
channel.description: I tried it and it's useless. You get like 4 exp per bar, but the bars are free thats why. Anyways, discuss.

item.title: New Update - Dwarf Workshop
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

http://runetracker.org/track-jeff+lynne
I get like 1.3m experience a day; 3.2m experience in 2 days.
It’s a great update in my opinion, I’ll be 99 smithing in 2-3 days.

Read full topic

item.title: New Update - Dwarf Workshop
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:18, topic:385429”]i actually find that the cannon repairing is good, fast xp.
and if you do it right you can churn out xp really fast :)[/quote]
No one on this site has the intention span to work at this place for more then a few hours though so not to worth it.

item.title: New Update - Dwarf Workshop
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:15, topic:385429”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=481185.msg3524444#msg3524444 date=1299689898]

In other words it took them 10 years but they finally figured out a way to nerf smithing?

I agree with you here, lol…

They’ve ruined RuneScape over the years.
If I had JaGeX’s files; I’d start RuneScape from scratch, and only do updates that people want, but there would be no way on earth i’d be getting them files! :mad:

Or be capable of rewriting Runescape
[/quote]

Or know which version of Java they are using.[/quote]

What?

item.title: New Update - Dwarf Workshop
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Speljohan:

Aprox 10gp per exp for the ceremonial mithril swords, but man is it fast exp when you get into it. I did it for one hour yesterday (including learning process) and got 115k exp. That includes 4 or 5 terrible swords made not giving any exp at all. I reckon i could get 150-170k exp an hour!

In other words it took them 10 years but they finally figured out a way to nerf smithing?

Read full topic

riku9182:

So bs update is BS?

I also find that the whole thing is bs. Part of it is members only when the skill is only a f2p… Don’t they think f2p has slow xp already… They could make it so they can just build cannons but obviously keep them as a p2p item.

I didn’t try any other parts but im guessing its still as useless as it was before and iv heard that it costs more (swords) because its kind of luck based.
